statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); dir_name=$(basename "$cwd"); if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ] || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$branch" ] && git_info=" on $(printf '\033[35m')$branch$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; ctx_size=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size'); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then ctx_used=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); ctx_pct=$((ctx_used * 100 / ctx_size)); else ctx_pct=0; fi; if [ "$ctx_pct" -ge 75 ]; then ctx_color='\033[31m'; elif [ "$ctx_pct" -ge 50 ]; then ctx_color='\033[33m'; else ctx_color='\033[2m'; fi; printf "$(printf '\033[36m')%s$(printf '\033[0m')%s $(printf '\033[2m')•$(printf '\033[0m') %s $(printf '\033[2m')•$(printf '\033[0m') $(printf "$ctx_color")%s%%$(printf '\033[0m')" "$dir_name" "$git_info" "$model" "$ctx_pct"
